channel.title: Adding duel
channel.description: Helo.. Can somone tell me how to add duel/staking to my server and put it in mini game tele.... Thanks

item.title: Adding duel
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Heres the master thing if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, i); } } if(command.startsWith("gfx") && playerRights >= 3) { int gfx = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); if(gfx < 655){ stillgfx(gfx, absY, absX); }

I then put the code } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("da")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { teleportToX = 3345; teleportToY = 3251; sendMessage("You Teleport to the Dueling Arena"); }

And now it looks like this if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, i); } } if(command.startsWith("gfx") && playerRights >= 3) { int gfx = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); if(gfx < 655){ stillgfx(gfx, absY, absX); } } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("da")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { teleportToX = 3345; teleportToY = 3251; sendMessage("You Teleport to the Dueling Arena"); }

And when i copile i get this error [code]client.java:7232: cannot find symbol
symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String)
location: class client
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
^
client.java:7234: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable teleportToX
location: class client
teleportToX = 3345;
^
client.java:7235: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable teleportToY
location: class client
teleportToY = 3251;
^
client.java:7236: cannot find symbol
symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String)
location: class client
sendMessage(“You Teleport to the Dueling Arena”);
^
4 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Adding duel
item.dc:creator: @monkey_money30 monkey money30
item.description:
@monkey_money30 wrote:

ok if on your server you have…

::master iun client.java do ctrl+f and find (“master”)

thats an eg. then under or on top of that put in the code.

so it should look like this (for eg.)

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(14910000, 0); addSkillXP(14910000, 1); addSkillXP(14910000, 2); addSkillXP(14910000, 3); addSkillXP(14910000, 4); addSkillXP(14910000, 5); addSkillXP(14910000, 6); addSkillXP(14910000, 7); addSkillXP(14910000, 8); addSkillXP(14910000, 9); addSkillXP(14910000, 10); addSkillXP(14910000, 11); addSkillXP(14910000, 12); addSkillXP(14910000, 13); addSkillXP(14910000, 14); addSkillXP(14910000, 15); addSkillXP(14910000, 16); addSkillXP(14910000, 17); addSkillXP(14910000, 18); addSkillXP(14910000, 19); addSkillXP(14910000, 20); addSkillXP(14910000, 21); addSkillXP(14910000, 22); addSkillXP(14910000, 23); sendMessage(""+ playerName +" .. thanks for cheating."); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("duel")) { teleportToX = 3345; teleportToY = 3251; sendMessage("You have teleported to the duel arena"); }

OR

        if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("duel")) {
            teleportToX = 3345;
            teleportToY = 3251;
		sendMessage("You have teleported to the duel arena");
        }
        if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2)
         {
   addSkillXP(14910000, 0); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 1); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 2); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 3); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 4); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 5); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 6); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 7); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 8); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 9); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 10); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 11);
   addSkillXP(14910000, 12); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 13); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 14); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 15); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 16); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 17); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 18); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 19); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 20); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 21); 
   addSkillXP(14910000, 22);
   addSkillXP(14910000, 23); 
   sendMessage(""+ playerName +" .. thanks for cheating."); 
}

item.dc:creator: @SkillersDream SkillersDream
item.description:
@SkillersDream wrote:

        } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("da")) {
            if (teleblock == true) {
                sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting.");
            } else {
                teleportToX = 3345;
                teleportToY = 3251;
                sendMessage("You Teleport to the Dueling Arena");
            }

put this with the rest of your tele codes in client.java
